import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import { Nav, Navbar, NavDropdown } from "react-bootstrap"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faHouse, faUser, faMessage, faCircleInfo, faGear, faLock, faRightFromBracket, faSun, faStar, faCalendarDay, faCalendarDays, faSquarePlus, faCalendarCheck, faClock, faGlobe, faTrashCan, faInfinity, } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; const Sidebar = () => { return ( <>
TICK-TOCK
Add Task My Day Important Scheduled Completed } id="basic-nav-dropdown" className="mb-3" > Recycle Bin All Tasks {/* Help */}
); }; export default Sidebar;
